description: Episode of Series "Psychology Today". Using for its base a crowded noisy cocktail party as observed from a control booth, analyses how people process information. Pretty girls and bizarrely dressed men demonstrate attention, language processing, long and short term memory, mnemonics, retrieval strategies, and problem solving.
